website_summaries.verdict: The Dell S2240T is a stylish 21.5-inch monitor with a reasonable price tag and a responsive 10-point capacitive touch screen. It's a decent performer, but there are better deals to be had for close to the same price.

customer_reviews.title: Twitch/Youtube Streamer Chat Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Perfect chat monitor for game streamers. The way this works is, you align it vertically and put your channel's chat window on it maximized. When you're in a game and want to type in chat, no more alt tabbing to the chat window, or trying to bring your mouse over to it to type something. Just tap the touch screen on the chat input, type what you want and hit enter. then continue gaming. It has never been easier boys. PogChamp in the chat
customer_reviews.author: Miguelito

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size with state-of-the-art touch-screen features.
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance and ordered this to replace a larger (24-inch) monitor. The resolution is great so I haven't noticed the smaller size but even if I did, the TOUCH-SCREEN feature would more than compensate. I still prefer to use a mouse and keyboard however the touch-screen allows you to stretch pictures to any size you want rather than pre-determined by click.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Konietzny

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement for POS Station
customer_reviews.text: This is a great touchscreen. We weren't sure what to expect, because we were purchasing them to replace ELO monitors for a POS station. It was so easy to install. We essentially just plugged it in and it started working seamlessly. The touch response is great. It'll be interesting to see how this holds up to being on 12 hours a day/7 days a week, but so far, it's exceeding expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor. Works well so far!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is very clear and the colors look great! The touch sensitivity is just right, as I don't find myself having to retouch things and constantly reslide my finger to get things to activate, like with some other screens. I would like to say more, but I don't really know what else there is to say. This is a touch monitor. It looks great, has good touch response time, and hasn't had any trouble yet. If you want a good touchscreen monitor for a reasonable price, consider this one.
customer_reviews.author: No Name Was Given

customer_reviews.title: ... this for close to a month now and have enjoyed it. The touch capacity is great for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for close to a month now and have enjoyed it. The touch capacity is great for the various kid games my son uses. Simple to set it up, but the HDMI cable has a bit of pressure on it due to its position that I worry may damage the cable over time...I could be wrong, though. Overall, great quality and better price.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Robertson

customer_reviews.title: One of the best monitors I have seen for use on a POS terminal
customer_reviews.text: Extremely impressed with this monitor, as is the store owner that I bought it for. One of the most impressive aspects since it was going to be used as a POS terminal is the incredibly rugged and adjustable stand assembly. Most of the others I looked at had plastic and less solid bases!
customer_reviews.author: Cappy Cross

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: First it was delivered to the wrong house - UPSs fault not Amazon's. Neighbor was nice enough to be honest and bring it over. As for the monitor: Touch is not sensitive enough. Have to touch it multiple times to work. Also MAJOR glare. I'm basically looking at myself. I just ordered an Anti Glare screen protector. Hope it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought this to draw in Photoshop with before I learned that you need a specific tablet (Wacom preferably or similar like Ugee) but it works awesome otherwise. Considering our smartphone and tablet generation it is definitely useful for all the times you go to swipe a screen and expect it to respond 😂 The color is amazing, the touch abilities are very useful for many things. Dell hasn't disappointed me yet.
customer_reviews.author: SteFoto

customer_reviews.title: Good Monitor
customer_reviews.text: It's a good monitor. I had Windows 8.1 when I got it and that OS is easier to use with a touch screen. Even with Windows 10 it's a nice feature to have. If you don't want or need a touch screen, I'd get something less expensive. But if you like to have the option it's a great monitor and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul V. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Linux
customer_reviews.text: Tested with Fedora 20 and works fine. There are some oddities to be aware of. The touch precision is fine for web browsing, button clicking, etc., but text highlighting and other finer details activities require a little more control. There is something strange in the Fedora 20 interface that occasionally when attempting to drag a window, a different window will be moved. However, this problem has to do with Fedora, the problem will surely be fixed, and this is a review of the monitor. Am using them on a couple of Linux based scientific instruments without mouse or keyboard and people like them.
customer_reviews.author: tech collector

customer_reviews.title: Love this big beautiful, touchable monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Does everything you would expect from a monitor and more. I love how large it is and I love being able to just reach up and touch it to make it do what I want. Great for all of my projects.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Heard

customer_reviews.title: 3 cables are required to be connected, don't get tangled
customer_reviews.text: In order to use the touch feature of this monitor, both a USB and a HDMI must be plugged in to your computer plus the power cord. Cordage is excessive and Dell could have done a better job with this product and eliminate one of the cords.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality, very responsive touch controls, great for work
customer_reviews.text: The stand is very well constructed, in my opinion. Some stands have a tendency to slip, particularly when you're trying for a low angle like you might use while standing. This one handles that situation really well. The quality of the screen didn't blow me away, but it looks fine for work which is what I use it for. I have a higher quality screen used for gaming and movies and whatnot, and I can definitely see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron T

customer_reviews.title: Bad Company and bad Monitor
customer_reviews.text: The touch screen on the monitor broke within 2 months. It began to shake and freeze multiple times a day. I bought a protection plan and sent back the item with a promise that I'd get a refund. This company got their faulty monitor back and never gave me my money back. The company is no good and the monitor is no good.
customer_reviews.author: matthew n roy

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen works great.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor worked fine right out of the box with no issues or setup required. Very much enjoying the touch screen monitor.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Walker

customer_reviews.title: High quality screen and tilt mechanism.
customer_reviews.text: Very responsive touch screen. I connected it to my Surface 3 dock. I am able to wake the deBvice and use all of the multi-touch gestures. The viewing angle can be adjusted very easily. The monitor is low profile which is just what I needed to fit under the kitchen cabinet. This is a welcome addition at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Great screen, cheap stand.
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor. Solid glass screen which seems very responsive. The only thing I dislike is the that the rubber feet on the bottom of the stand are very poorly made and keep falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: I got this as a gift for my husband. ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband. He loves it but wishes it had built in sound. It is worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Installed these touch screens in my exam rooms at work. They are awesome. They are mounted on the walls with low profile mounts and have a very slick and attractive look. I did not use the included stands as mine are the wall. However, the stands are pretty cool. The touch screen is bright, has an excellent picture, and touch feature works well so far. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hey Dude

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - after a little work.
customer_reviews.text: It took some time to set this up in Windows 8 - there were some weird things happening with windows resizing automatically, etc. Definitely do your homework if you plan to use this as a second monitor, as there are a couple of steps you'll have to take. After all the work, though, the monitor is great, highly responsive and great to look at. The build quality is better than I thought, and I constantly adjust from a stand up to a tablet stance for graphic work and it transitions smoothly but comfortably and I don't feel at risk of breaking or bending anything.
customer_reviews.author: deanandmaria

customer_reviews.title: Got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't great by today's standard but if you're looking for something cheap, then this works!
customer_reviews.author: budlight

customer_reviews.title: Really like this monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Boy like this monitor. I move it around for use with music related projects Use it with Soundcraft UI-24r and as an extra monitor when using Martin M-PC software.
customer_reviews.author: rc-

customer_reviews.title: Really good monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: I shopped both retail stores and on line before purchasing this Dell monitor. The stores had very little or no selection (on touch screen monitors) so Amazon was the natural place to purchase. I relied on the reviews, brand and price point to make my selection. The resolution and performance are fine for my purposes which primarily involve MS Office.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Not as bright as we had hoped First screen received had been used
customer_reviews.author: Deneen Caprio

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. The power female socket came in crooked ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. The power female socket came in crooked inside, but no issues with power. Display output is okay.
customer_reviews.author: ALLAN MERCADO

customer_reviews.title: The touch screen works very well. I am just ...
customer_reviews.text: The touch screen works very well. I am just so used to a mouse that I don't take advantage of the touch screen. Everything is ultra sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Werner D

customer_reviews.title: Great, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor. Some people say it doesn't come with all the right cords, but it does (power cord, HDMI cord, and USB cable). It is really responsive, the monitor itself has a really adjustable angle, and everything just looks great. FYI, this monitor is EXTREMELY glossy. I don't mind, I actually prefer it, but just something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: caseyh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor! Especially with Win 8.1. Very cool design that allows you to use ALL the Touch Functions, and is really cool when lowered to use like a Tablet! I sit closely in front of it, so this is perfect size! (Was going to get the Larger Model, but would be TOO big!) Don’t even think anymore, just get this!!! 
customer_reviews.author: Kurt T. Koehn

customer_reviews.title: Not very reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought one 2 weeks ago, the monitor look goog and it seems worked great. Drcided buying a second one for different office. It did not work, have to return. Hope the replacement will work.
customer_reviews.author: xiang ouyang

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design
customer_reviews.text: like the sleek design. Size wise is perfect size for a second monitor for your laptop, as it's not too big when you are sitting at your desk. the solid glass and metal look great unlike other cheaper plastic monitor displays. screen is reponsive to the touch, no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Donaghy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, was received as described, was delivered at the correct time.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Paniagua

customer_reviews.title: Great for a medical office touch screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a medical office setting to replace some very expensive but non- landscape touch screens I had been using for a couple years. This is way better when it comes to the touchscreen function and a better picture to boot. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: julian c from wv

customer_reviews.title: Great touch screen monitor at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This monitor worked well with my Windows 7 installation. Now I can't wait to find the time to upgrade my computer to Windows 8.1. I am using Windows 8.1 on my tablet and notebook. I have come to realize that a touch screen makes all the difference in whether you love or hate windows 8. This monitor will allow me to upgrade. It is a nice size. I love how you can position it at whatever angle is comfortable. Dell also makes a beautiful display. It has inputs for HDMI, VGA and HDMI. Really, I have yet to find a con for this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory P. Alford

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and was shipped super fast for a price I couldn't pass up on
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and was shipped super fast for a price I couldn't pass up on...thank and works on Windows 10!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: great touch screen
customer_reviews.text: great touch screen. works out of the box with a Chromebox without any setup. The adjustable stand is very useful for viewing angles. Only con i can think is no speakers. but over great for a touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: xexy

customer_reviews.title: and I can say its a nice bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Now using it with my new laptop on a Window 10 machine. and I can say its a nice bit of kit!
customer_reviews.author: Rajabali Rajabali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good touch screen monitor, no problem with W7 and W10
customer_reviews.author: cvn

customer_reviews.title: Touch Panel Computer Screen
customer_reviews.text: The computer screen arrived in an undamaged condition and hooked up nicely with my Dell Computer. I had a computer that was originally Windows XP then upgraded to Windows 7. It had become slow and 'glitchy' so decided to buy new hardware. So far, everything is running smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and less expensive Dell touch screen.
customer_reviews.text: this is a great addition to any Windows 8.1 machine ,or any touch screen system. I found that versatility of its stand and the price very appealing. I have had it for several weeks now and use it in multiple locations, travels well and easy to setup. Remember this type of screen requires a DVI/HDMI and USB connection. Touch screen capabilityis provided via the USB.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality-Made & Elegant Design
customer_reviews.text: High quality, LED back-lit, frameless glass touch screen at an affordable price. It's responsive and works well with with Windows 8. Setup was hassle-free and it came with all the cables needed for touch screen capability. Possibly the best looking monitor on the market
customer_reviews.author: Phantom Shoppe

customer_reviews.title: Monitor without sound
customer_reviews.text: Realized that you cannot get sound through the monitor. Kind of pointless. Would have been nice to know that you need external speakers. Why werent they built in?
customer_reviews.author: Tony G. Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor for use in my very stylish office. I have been blown away by how well it works with Windows 8, as well as how awesome it looks. In fact for a couple of weeks I had to use it as a primary screen and it was a treat with an older tablet. I highly recommend this as a second screen, and a primary one too!
customer_reviews.author: NCPinAtl

customer_reviews.title: Touch feature did not work.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this item seeing it's reviews, but unfortunately the touch feature did not work, and Dell customer service was no help... back to Amazon. Overall, the monitor's quality was so good I had to give it two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F.

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: These Monitors worked wonderfully right out of the box. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a DIY photobooth for having push buttons for "B&W" and "Color". Worked great with my laptop and the photobooth software right out of the box. I wouldn't recommend it for a photobooth because it's a lot bigger than is needed to show the picture of the people and 2 buttons, but if that happens to be your idea, a smaller model of this touch panel would be perfect. I'll now be using it as a monitor for a new computer I'm building.
customer_reviews.author: R. Emmons

customer_reviews.title: Great features, fantastic touch response, OK picture.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tilt feature, great touch response. Image is slightly washed out looking when compared to other monitors, but I'm still quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: 1 of 4 ordered DOA
customer_reviews.text: 1 of the original 4 ordered had non-functional touch and had to be returned for a replacement. Otherwise, the uses are enjoying these.
customer_reviews.author: Mike GR

customer_reviews.title: Video issues
customer_reviews.text: The monitor developed lines from top to bottom of screen. Six lines covering about a one inch wide area. I have only used the monitor a dozen times for about four hours each time. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Arsenault

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully constructed by terrible image!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it just my bad copy but this produces a terrible image for me. The external monitor I had before it was very nice and so was the replacement I got for this one. The image was also terrible compared to my computer's primary display. The machined metal stand and edge to edge flat touchscreen are beautiful though. Touchscreen response was terrible compared to my Win 8 computer's primary touch screen. Not sure if that was due to sub-optimal settings or intrinsic to USB cable operations. I blame the monitor because my keyboard and mouse are on wireless USB and yet operate flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Chou

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: High quality monitor, touch screen works under Windows7, which I didn't exspect. Only drawback is the highly reflective surface (like an iPad). I use it under low light levels to minimize reflection.
customer_reviews.author: Grady Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Just the job as a second large screen
customer_reviews.text: This product is essential for the person with the small touch tablet (mine is a Surface Pro). Reliable, responsive and without any problems. No need any longer to peer at a small screen. Play your streaming films and live sport without any hassle. A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Homer

customer_reviews.title: Great photo booth monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I will be using this monitor for my photo booth project and it responds really well. I tested it when it received it.
customer_reviews.author: Ramyphotography_com

customer_reviews.title: Dell Computer S2240T
customer_reviews.text: hello Colors and clear image quality Lightweight Ease of preparation and connection Automatically recognize the cable connection Monitor Stand is made of aluminum and can be modified as desired screen mode She supports Windows 8 touch support full 10-point touch Screen 1080 * 1920 screen resolution recommended Screen good price compared with the performance of the screen Screen contains connectors HDMI and VGA and USB to run touch feature and exit port for audio Excellent screen with touch technology You must connect the USB cable to run Touch Only reduces screen presence headphones built for voice Screen worth evaluating 8/10 Good luck...
customer_reviews.author: kasem

customer_reviews.title: Clear and crisp!
customer_reviews.text: I work from home, and needed a monitor that, "does it all"... this is just the ticket! Great size, clarity, functionality, easy to set up right out of the box. Highly recommend for anyone spending a lot of time in front of your computer with the need to do so much more than a conventional monitor!!
customer_reviews.author: michelle r greenwalt

customer_reviews.title: they work great!
customer_reviews.text: So far we have 11 of them, they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No plastic frame, glass from edge to edge
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. Using it with Windows 7 so 10-finger functionality is limited. I plan to upgrade to Win 8 in near future. I actually have 2 of these monitors side by side. Very efficient being able to keep multiple windows open on 2 screens. I also like the fact that these monitors do not have a plastic frame. The glass extends completely from edge to edge.
customer_reviews.author: E. Su

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to Dell's 11 tablet
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to go with my new Dell Venue 11 Pro and dock. Also use it with my old Toshiba Laptop and docking station. Works perfect with both.
customer_reviews.author: Jroski

customer_reviews.title: Works great, used it with a Gateway computer
customer_reviews.text: Works great, used it with a Gateway computer, and a lenovo laptop, now using it on my new Dell. Easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Guntle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Liked it so much that now I have one at work and one at home.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marroquin

customer_reviews.title: good price. Not a gaming monitor but a good ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good price. Not a gaming monitor but a good option kiosks.
customer_reviews.author: mark p tobias

customer_reviews.title: Dell put together a great monitor.  Stylish, sturdy and a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.text: Bright crisp picture. Love the touch screen. Very pleased with its overall performance. With windows 8.1, I found it as a "must have."
customer_reviews.author: Walter F

customer_reviews.title: Best Value in Touchscreen
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price for 10 capacitive touch points in full HD. We own 3 touchscreens computers and combined with Windows 8 mine is the envy of the household. Another nice feature is Dell Display Manager also included changes the screen calibration according to what kind of app is on screen. Finally the only negative point is if the touch is used heavily over a extended period of time, like painting a picture, the touch usb cable must be re-plugged in to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: SUNSHINE

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Install the needed driver then plug and play! that simple... great product so far. Using this on a HP laptop for kids self checkin at church.
customer_reviews.author: J.Long

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice touch screen monitor, very happy with quality of this.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen & Mike

customer_reviews.title: Dell Computer S2240T Touch Panel HSV56 21.5 Screen Led-lit Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a dell xps 8100 desktop and wanted the monitor to be same brand. the screen content is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor! Worked right out of the box, and Windows 10 installed the correct drivers right off.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Deml

customer_reviews.title: One of the Biggest & Lightest Touch screens on the Market..!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great Screen with High Resolution and Brightness. The touch functionality works smoothly. Cons: I just wish the screen was finger print resistance. Also it has some friction (finger to screen) while moving fingers on the screen for gestures or any long swipes (Not as smooth as smart phones)
customer_reviews.author: Sam M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Touch Screen
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Works perfectly with my laptop port replicator. Has a good selection of inputs. Excellent picture and color
customer_reviews.author: DaveP

customer_reviews.title: Super Touch-screen Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I unpacked it and connected it and it worked beautifully right out of the box. Colors are bright and vivid. I am immensely pleased with this monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good design
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Works wonderfully as a touchscreen and a nice resolution monitor. Good black depth. The stand is a fixed height but other stands can be interchanged. The monitor does not have attachment points for a soundbar, or microphone, or camera. The monitor used USB to send the touch signals to the computer. However, it does not have USB ports.
customer_reviews.author: wanderlust

customer_reviews.title: Monitor is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Monitor is as advertised. Beautiful screen, easy setup and very responsive, fantastic product. Only issues I had was with the seller who misplaced the order and didn't dispatch the order until I called to inquire about it. The Nerds get 2 stars for that
customer_reviews.author: G Money

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much it works great
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much it works great. There seems to be a compatibility problem with my Gateway computer when in 8.1 the screen size drop's to 19.5-inch. After a lot of checking it appears that it is a computer problem and nothing to do with the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Riley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best touch screen monitor out there good for animation big screen two 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using a touch screen. I'm used to using my pad and phone, of course, but this is a whole new experience. It's very attractive and has a great picture. I was afraid the screen would become dirty pretty fast but so far it has stayed remarkably clean. Part of that may be because I am so used to using a mouse, I sometimes forget to use my finger. But it just seems so intuitive to touch the screen and get things done very quickly - much more quickly than with a mouse. I am very happy I purchased this Dell touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this monitor. It looks amazing and it was easy to setup. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have an LG next to this Dell,the LG is a bit clearer.
customer_reviews.author: George K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Dell makes a great touch option!
customer_reviews.text: The Dell touch monitor is wonderful in the way it flexes up and down, for however you want to use it. It is stylin' and works very well with Windows 8
customer_reviews.author: M. Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: nice touch screen
customer_reviews.text: operates as advertised. very responsive to touch and great colors. Easy hook up and the controls are very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur Shinholser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match for windows 8.1
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor, it works wonderfully with my windows 8.1 . The picture is clean and crisp. It is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: fantastic product for those who only have windows 8
customer_reviews.text: fantastic product for those who only have windows 8.1 desktop with this touch screen it's so wonderful to use... I would suggest this product
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect in multiple ways
customer_reviews.text: Item works well. Screen recognizes touch and is really clear. Easy to connect in multiple ways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for music and so far it is working out very nicely indeed. The tilt feature a must for music, raking it back like a mixing board.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Tubbs

customer_reviews.title: More than happy
customer_reviews.text: After ordering 2 touchscreen monitors that I had to return because they did not work with my OS so when I received this monitor I had my fingers crossed. Happily it works and works very well. The screen adds to the experience of using Microsoft 8. For me the price was right and Dell is a name I have trusted for over 15 years. I recommend without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: NCSC

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy it setup
customer_reviews.text: Good monitor but takes up a USB port for touch screen use. Other monitors handle that via HDMI.
customer_reviews.author: Dropman@GA

customer_reviews.title: Dell Computer S2240T Touch Panel
customer_reviews.text: I gave this monitor to my mom as a gift. She is 80+ facing the Windows 8 nightmare on a new PC... I thought she would appreciate the touchscreen. And she does. The installation was a breeze! The the screen is bright and very clear. The touch actions were flawless and very easy for her to use. Great product for general use at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: No_Spark

customer_reviews.title: Great Touch Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Had this for almost a year now. It has worked great with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: eclas

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Win 8.1
customer_reviews.text: Looks great ..colors are sharp...the touch works great with Win 8.1...seems good for gaming....very happy with it...my wife loves it
customer_reviews.author: Mekhed

customer_reviews.title: Great Equipment
customer_reviews.text: This is a great touch screen. Easy to install and works great. Make computer work a whole new experience. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Harris

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheap touchscreen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a workbench pc so that I don't have to waste my limited workbench space with a keyboard and mouse. It's connected to a windows 7 pc and the touch features work great. The picture quality and resolution are not perfect but they are good enough and you get what you pay for. This is a good value if you want a budget touchscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy setup. A little clunky with the wires but to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: This is the best monitor I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: If you have windows 8.1 you need this monitor because touch screen is supported. I have a state of the art tower, so I wanted a state of the art monitor. This one has met and exceeded all Of my hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Mizell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much! The Amazon Essentials Aluminum arm is a must have
customer_reviews.author: Kassidy Heal

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor I've had so far
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor I've had so far. I was surprised by the size of it, it's pretty large and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Francia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Monitor works great, extremely happy with how well the stand works as well
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for Me!
customer_reviews.text: I have the S2240T paired to my Dell Inspiron 3647 desktop and it works perfectly with Windows 8.1
customer_reviews.author: william carbone

customer_reviews.title: I Like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but the draw backs are: To change from VGA to HDMI and back is very painful, the menus take to many steps. My HP monitor is easier to use. Also, I don't know if it is because it is a touch screen, but the picture crispness and colors are not as good as my regular (non touch screen) HP monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W. Corkill

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor but not great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a monitor works fine! I gave it a 4 instead of 5 because the clarity is not quite a good as my old 21.5 inch Dell monitor which was not a touchscreen. Also, you can't touch the corners of the screen to get the charms, etc. For the price I think this monitor is fine!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: base is wobbly
customer_reviews.text: The base is unstable and the monitor keeps falling over when ever the table is slightly bumped. Screen cracked because of it
customer_reviews.author: chopec79

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy that for a dollar
customer_reviews.text: okay... I am beyond excited!!!! My Windows 7 machine has two monitors... and I wish they were both touchscreens now. This Dell monitor looks great....the sliding of the stand works well, and its sooo inexpensive Money well spent
customer_reviews.author: ADifferentView

customer_reviews.title: The color and contrast are very good and it adds greatly to the experience of working ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor as a second monitor for my Surface Pro 3. The monitor and its touchscreen functionality installed with no effort and the touchscreen functions seamlessly with the display on the Surface Pro 3. The color and contrast are very good and it adds greatly to the experience of working with the Surface computer
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G. Schneider

product_meta.title: Dell S2240T 21.5-Inch Touch Screen LED-lit Monitor
product_meta.description:
Style:One MonitorThe Dell 21.5" touch monitor -offering you the touch experience with unparalleled flexibility and convenience.

AMAZON.COM




DELL 21.5" TOUCH MONITOR


FLEXIBLE AND USER-FRIENDLY FOR WORK, SCHOOL OR FUN.
Multi-touch, Full HD display offers exceptional clarity and usability in a clean, efficient design. Ideal for students and professionals.

 * Clarity with touch: Full HD with 1920 x 1080 (max) resolution; 10-point touch capability; 3000:1 (typical) contrast ratio for bright, clear images with amazing onscreen detail.
 * Ergonomic stand: Slide the panel toward you smoothly and naturally to touch and type and tilt the panel up to 60° to fit your comfort level.
 * Efficient design: Power consumption of only 20W (typical) to help control energy costs; meets latest ENERGY STAR® guidelines and is EPEAT® Silver rated.





EXCEPTIONAL USABILITY.
Designed to encourage collaboration and give productivity a boost, the Dell 21.5" Touch Monitor offers a high level of user flexibility for work, school or entertainment.

 * Ergonomic stand: Slide your display toward you smoothly and naturally to touch and type while tilting as much as 60°. Good for classrooms, home offices, clinics and other professional applications.
 * VESA compatibility: You can also choose to mount your monitor on the wall or attach it to the Dell Single Monitor Arm to enjoy even greater viewing flexibility.
 * Integrated connectivity: HDMI, DVI and VGA ports enable direct connections to your desktop, laptop, camera, phone and other electronic devices to enhance almost any view.
 * Image projection: Enabling touch is easy! Simply connect the USB cable from your PC to the monitor's USB upstream port, and use either a HDMI, DVI or VGA cable to project images onscreen.




NATURAL TOUCH AND SUPERB IMAGE CLARITY.
Tap, slide, swipe, turn, pinch and stretch with your fingers. The multi-touch capability is simple and intuitive when used with Windows 8, recognizing up to 10 touch points at once.
Offering excellent image quality, the Dell 21.5" Touch Monitor features:

 * Great screen clarity: 16:9 Full HD with 1920 x 1080 (max) resolution; 3,000:1 (typical) high contrast ratio; Mega Dynamic contrast ratio estimated at 8 million:1 (max); wide 178°/178° viewing angle for effective collaboration.
 * Edge-to-edge glass: Big, clean panel for a smooth touch experience plus Image Enhance designed to sharpen images, improve color hues and boost color contrast.
 * Dell Display Manager: Features Auto Mode, which offers a choice of preconfigured color settings to optimize the appearance of individual applications. Each application can have its own preset mode.




EFFICIENT DESIGN.
Conceived with a high priority on environmental efficiency, the Dell 21.5" Touch Monitor features low power consumption and environment-conscious materials.

 * 20W typical power consumption: Energy use is up to 28.57 percent lower than the previous-generation Dell Touch Monitor.
 * Power-saving features: Dynamic dimming lowers brightness of predominantly white screens. PowerNap, when enabled, dims the monitor when not in use.
 * High environmental standards: ENERGY STAR® qualified and EPEAT® Silver rated, the Dell 21.5" Touch Monitor also features arsenic-free glass and a mercury-free LED panel.







DELL S2240T 21.5" MONITOR
AT A GLANCE...
 * Diagonal Viewable Size: 21.5" (18.77" horiz., 10.56" vert.)
 * Display Type: Multi-touch full HD LED
 * Resolution: Full HD 1920 x 1080 (60Hz)
 * Aspect Ratio: 16:9 (widescreen)
 * Contrast Ratio: 3,000:1 (typical), 8 million:1 (dynamic, max)
 * Max Viewing Angle: 178° vertical (typical), 178° horizontal (typical)
 * Brightness: 250 cd/m2 (typical)
 * Color Gamut: CIE1931 (72%)
 * Response Time: 25 ms (typical), 12 ms (typical) with Overdrive
 * Pixel Pitch: 0.248 x 0.248 mm
 * Connectivity: HDMI, DVI, VGA



PHOTO GALLERY
feature_bullets: Sleek and stylish - Edge-to-edge glass gives the Dell 21.5" touch monitor a clean finish that boasts of fine craftsmanship.
Enabling touch is easy! Simply connect a USB cable from your PC to the monitor's USB upstream port, and use either an HDMI, DVI or VGA cable to project images onscreen

This is not a computer. Requires a standalone computer to use.Touch technology:Projected capacitive system,Sensor stack thickness:1.1 mm,Cover glass thickness:1.1 +/- 0.2 mm,Touch method:Fingers and thin gloves,Touch point:10 touch-points,Response time:25 ms. Compatibility- All Operating System
